name: Bearalot: Bear Links
summary:
MacDoogle's farm was once a happy place but it's all gone bear-shaped after Lisa the Tiger took over.
Even Macdoogle himself was made a slave, but hes not one to bear a grudge.
Now the fruit and animals must bear the pain and join together to escape from the evil crown bearer of the farm.
If the plan doesn't bear fruit soon, they will all be baked in a pie!
